sentence.Network_en: One night Bufflehead, while on duty, accidentally interrupted a hold up of a grocery store.
sentence.Network_cn: 一天夜里,巴福尔黑德在值勤时无意中碰上一起抢劫杂货店事件.

sentence.Network_en: Investigation afterward brought out Bufflehead did not even try to draw his gun.
sentence.Network_cn: 事后调查证明,巴福尔黑德甚至没有想拔枪.

PerfectNetExp.abs: buffet 餐具柜bufflehead 小鸭buffo 男低音歌手
buffle 阻断, bufflehead 巨头鹊鸭, bufflehead 小鸭的一种

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'simpleton'): from obsolete buffle 'buffalo' + head. The current sense (mid 18th cent.) may be an independent formation because of the duck's large square-shaped head

means.word_mean: 1. small North American diving duck; males have bushy head plumage
